ResourceHeader.Description:
These Akebono ATV auroral images are available
at somewhat irregular time intervals.  There are also a few brief 
movies of various types of auroral forms.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement:
In any publications, the use of the Akebono data 
should be acknowledged, for example, as "Akebono LEP data were provided 
by M. Ejiri through DARTS at Institute of Space and Astronautical Science, 
JAXA in Japan."

InformationURL.Name: DARTS_ATV readme
InformationURL.Description:
This readme is written in SJIS code, not readable by 
me!
